title: Skin Care Medical Spa | BOHO Alternative MedSpa | (972) 853-5447
author: Erika Lawhon
description: Custom skin care Medical Spa in Allen TX. Best facials, dermaplaning, lasers, fillers, hydrafacial, microneedling, laser hair removal in town
cleaned_text: Our award-winning Dallas staff Our Estheticians Skin Care Med Spa in Allen, TX Refresh your skin, body, and mind when you visit BOHO Alternative Med Spa. Unlike other spas, our skin care refuses to use harsh chemicals and toxins in our treatments. Instead, we ensure that all our facials, peels, fillers, medical spa packages, and other treatment services use products that contain natural and non-toxic ingredients. People travel from across the country to visit us here in Allen, TX, because of our knowledgeable Top Industry Award-Winning medical estheticians that will create and customize treatments specifically for you, so you can leave looking and feeling your best. You can find us all over social media and we would love to connect with you on [Tiktok](https://www.tiktok.com/@bohomedspa?lang=en), or We are very proud of the service we provide and stand by every product we carry.
